name: Pixel 7
subtitle: 128 GB, Obsidian, 6.3'', SIM + eSIM, 50 Mpx, 5G
description: Meet Pixel 7. Powered by Google Tensor G2, it's fast and secure, with amazing battery life and the advanced Pixel Camera. Take beautifully authentic, accurate photos with Real Tone and stunning video with Cinematic Blur. And with the certified Titan M2 security chip and a built-in VPN, Pixel helps protect your personal data.

name: iPhone 13
subtitle: 128 GB, Midnight, 6.1'', SIM + eSIM, 12 Mpx, 5G
description: iPhone 13. The most advanced dual-camera system ever on iPhone. Lightning-fast A15 Bionic chip. A big leap in battery life. Durable design. Superfast 5G. And a brighter Super Retina XDR display. · 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display · Cinematic mode adds shallow depth of field and shifts focus automatically in your videos · Advanced dual-camera system with 12MP Wide and Ultra Wide cameras; Photographic Styles, Smart HDR 4, Night mode, 4K Dolby Vision HDR recording · 12MP TrueDepth front camera with Night mode, 4K Dolby Vision HDR recording · A15 Bionic chip for lightning-fast performance · Up to 19 hours of video playback · Durable design with Ceramic Shield · Industry-leading IP68 water resistance · 5G for superfast downloads and high-quality streaming · iOS 15 packs new features to do more with iPhone than ever before · Supports MagSafe accessories for easy attach and faster wireless charging Data plan required. 5G is available in select markets and through select carriers. Speeds vary based on site conditions and carrier.

name: S23
subtitle: 128 GB, Phantom Black, 6.1'', SIM + eSIM, 50 Mpx, 5G
description: The Samsung Galaxy S23 Series ushers in the next era of night photography and mobile gaming. Now you can capture the smallest details and most vibrant colours in any lighting situation with the Galaxy S23 Ultra's 200MP camera - and take super-bright night portraits with the 12MP selfie camera with dual-pixel technology. The new, powerful Snapdragon 8 Gen2 processor and longer battery life take mobile gaming to a whole new level. Enjoy your favourite games in any lighting situation - be it in direct sunlight or total darkness - thanks to a brighter and smarter display. Adaptive colours also reduce eye fatigue. And with the even more durable GorillaGlass Victus2, the Galaxy S23 is protected like never before.

name: Galaxy A53 5G Enterprise Edition
subtitle: 128 GB, Awesome Black, 6.5'', Dual SIM, 64 Mpx, 5G
description: The Galaxy A53 5G offers an excellent multimedia experience with its crystal clear 120 Hz Super Amoled display and versatile cameras. Take beautiful photos with the quad camera or take full advantage of the performance to play your favourite game. The perfect battery with fast-charging technology ensures plenty of power no matter what you're doing - be it gaming, taking photos or simply surfing.

name: Galaxy A54 5G
subtitle: 128 GB, Awesome Graphite, 6.4'', Hybrid Dual SIM, 50 Mpx, 5G
description: The Galaxy A54 5G offers you a great multimedia experience with its crystal clear 120 Hz sAMOLED display. Capture your best moments with the 50 MP triple camera and enjoy your favourite games and series on the go with the powerful performance. The 5000 mAh battery with Fast Charging ensures that you always have enough power.

name: Redmi Note 12 Pro+
subtitle: 256 GB, Sky blue, 6.6'', Dual SIM, 200 Mpx, 5G
description: Xiaomi Redmi Note 12 Pro+ with 5G and 8 GB + 256 GBFeatures:-Display: 6.6'' / 16.94 cm AMOLED display with touchscreen -Display resolution (pixels): 2400 x 1080 Full HD+ -Processor: MediaTek Dimensity 1080 Octa Core clocked at 2.6 GHz -Memory: 8 GB RAM -Internal storage: 256 GB ROM -Rear cameras: 200 MP (f/1.65) main camera, 8 MP (f/2.2) ultra-WW camera, 2 MP (f/2.4) macro camera -Front camera: 16 MP (f/2.45) selfie camera -Communications: 5G, LTE/4G, UMTS/3G, GSM/2G -Connectivity: Bluetooth 5.2, WLAN -Navigation/Location: GPS, Beidou, Glonass, A-GPS -Sensors: Fingerprint sensor, Ambient light sensor, Accelerometer, Geomagnetic sensor, Gyroscope, Proximity sensor, Electronic compass, IR blaster -SIM card: Dual-SIM (2x Nano-SIM) -Connections: 1x USB-C 2.0, 1x 3.5 mm headphone jack -Battery: 4980 mAh, fast charging function -Operating system: Android 12 -User interface: MIUI 13 -Dimensions (W x H x D): 76.03 x 162.9 x 8.9 mm -Weight: 208.4 g.
